forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 5am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 58, with temperatures rising to around 60 overnight. South southwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 64. West southwest wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
